metadata.name: Windows Kernel Debugger Execution
metadata.comment: Detects execution of the Windows Kernel Debugger "kd.exe".

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\kd.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('kd.exe'))

output.summary: Detects execution of the Windows Kernel Debugger "kd.exe".

metadata.objective: False positive: Rare occasions of legitimate cases where kernel debugging is necessary in production. Investigation is required Reference: Internal Research
